g:FlowPanel.g:Label: CREATE, SHARE, DOWNLOAD & ENJOY
PlaceBooks enable you to create digital booklets about your favourite places and share them with your friends and other PlaceBook users.

g:HTMLPanel.h4: WELCOME TO THE WORLD AS SEEN THROUGH YOUR EYES

ul.li: Add digital content to your booklets, including geo-tagged content (maps, routes, videos, photos, audio, and text).
Publish and share with friends or other members of the PlaceBook community who have similar interests.
Take PlaceBooks with you on your smart phone and use them to guide you around new and interesting places.

g:HTMLPanel.p: If you would like to add geo-tagged content to your PlaceBooks we recommend EveryTrails
